---

I've fixed the ESLint error in the `useComponentRender.js` file. The issue was in the `withRenderPerformance` HOC where we were using `componentName` in the `displayName` assignment, but that variable was only defined inside the `WrappedComponent` function scope.

The solution was to create a new `displayName` variable in the outer scope that uses the same logic to determine the component name:

```javascript
const displayName = options.componentName || Component.displayName || Component.name || 'Component';
WrappedComponent.displayName = `WithRenderPerformance(${displayName})`;
```

This ensures the variable is properly defined and accessible when setting the `displayName` property on the wrapped component, which resolves the ESLint `no-undef` error.

```diff
+  * @param {boolean} props.isLoading - Whether the data is loading
+  * @param {Object} props.pagination - Pagination options
+  * @param {number} props.pagination.pageIndex - Current page index
+  * @param {number} props.pagination.pageSize - Number of items per page
+  * @param {Function} props.onPaginationChange - Callback when pagination changes
+  * @param {Object} props.sorting - Sorting options

+   // Memoize data to prevent unnecessary re-renders

+   const table = useReactTable({

+     enableRowSelection: true,

+       <DataTablePagination table={table} />
```

```diff
+ import React from 'react';
+ import { X, Search, SlidersHorizontal } from 'lucide-react';
+ import { cn } from '../../../lib/utils';
+ 
+ /**
+  * Toolbar component for the DataTable with filtering and view options
+  * 
+  * @param {Object} props - Component props
+  * @param {Object} props.table - TanStack table instance
+  * @param {Array} props.filterableColumns - Columns that can be filtered
+  * @param {string} props.globalFilter - Global filter value
+  * @param {Function} props.setGlobalFilter - Function to set global filter
+  * @param {React.ReactNode} props.children - Additional content for the toolbar
+  * @param {string} props.className - Additional CSS classes
+  */
+ const DataTableToolbar = ({
+   table,
+   filterableColumns = [],
+   globalFilter,
+   setGlobalFilter,
+   children,
+   className,
+ }) => {
+   const isFiltered = table.getState().columnFilters.length > 0 || globalFilter;
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className={cn('flex flex-wrap items-center justify-between gap-2 p-2', className)}>
+       <div className="flex flex-1 items-center space-x-2">
+         <div className="relative w-full max-w-sm">
+           <Search className="absolute left-2 top-1/2 h-4 w-4 -translate-y-1/2 text-muted-foreground" />
+           <input
+             placeholder="Search..."
+             value={globalFilter || ''}
+             onChange={(e) => setGlobalFilter(e.target.value)}
+             className="h-9 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent pl-8 pr-8 text-sm ring-offset-background focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring"
+           />
+           {globalFilter && (
+             <button
+               onClick={() => setGlobalFilter('')}
+               className="absolute right-2 top-1/2 h-4 w-4 -translate-y-1/2 text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground"
+               aria-label="Clear search"
+             >
+               <X className="h-4 w-4" />
+             </button>
+           )}
+         </div>
+ 
+         {filterableColumns.length > 0 && (
+           <div className="hidden items-center space-x-2 md:flex">
+             <button
+               className="inline-flex h-9 items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm font-medium text-muted-foreground hover:bg-muted hover:text-foreground"
+               aria-label="Filter"
+             >
+               <SlidersHorizontal className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />
+               Filter
+             </button>
+           </div>
+         )}
+ 
+         {isFiltered && (
+           <button
+             onClick={() => {
+               table.resetColumnFilters();
+               setGlobalFilter('');
+             }}
+             className="inline-flex h-9 items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm font-medium text-muted-foreground hover:bg-muted hover:text-foreground"
+             aria-label="Reset filters"
+           >
+             Reset
+             <X className="ml-2 h-4 w-4" />
+           </button>
+         )}
+       </div>
+ 
+       <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
+         {children}
+       </div>
+     </div>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default DataTableToolbar; 
```

```diff
+ import React, { useState } from 'react';
+ import { Check, EyeOff, Settings2 } from 'lucide-react';

+ 
+ /**
+  * Component for managing column visibility in the DataTable
+  * 
+  * @param {Object} props - Component props
+  * @param {Object} props.table - TanStack table instance
+  * @param {string} props.className - Additional CSS classes
+  */
+ const DataTableViewOptions = ({ table, className }) => {
+   const [open, setOpen] = useState(false);
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className={cn('relative', className)}>
+       <button
+         onClick={() => setOpen(!open)}
+         className="inline-flex h-9 items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm font-medium text-muted-foreground hover:bg-muted hover:text-foreground"
+         aria-label="View options"
+       >
+         <Settings2 className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />
+         View
+       </button>
+       
+       {open && (
+         <>
+           <div 
+             className="fixed inset-0 z-40" 
+             onClick={() => setOpen(false)}
+             aria-hidden="true"
+           />
+           <div className="absolute right-0 top-full z-50 mt-2 w-48 rounded-md border bg-popover p-2 shadow-md">
+             <div className="mb-2 px-2 py-1.5 text-sm font-semibold">Toggle columns</div>
+             <div className="divide-y">
+               {table.getAllColumns()
+                 .filter(
+                   (column) =>
+                     typeof column.accessorFn !== 'undefined' && column.getCanHide()
+                 )
+                 .map((column) => {
+                   return (
+                     <div
+                       key={column.id}
+                       className="relative flex cursor-pointer items-center px-2 py-1.5 text-sm hover:bg-muted"
+                       onClick={() => column.toggleVisibility(!column.getIsVisible())}
+                     >
+                       <div
+                         className={cn(
+                           'mr-2 flex h-4 w-4 items-center justify-center rounded-sm border',
+                           column.getIsVisible() ? 'bg-primary border-primary' : 'opacity-50'
+                         )}
+                       >
+                         {column.getIsVisible() ? (
+                           <Check className="h-3 w-3 text-primary-foreground" />
+                         ) : (
+                           <EyeOff className="h-3 w-3" />
+                         )}
+                       </div>
+                       {column.columnDef.header || column.id}
+                     </div>
+                   );
+                 })}
+             </div>
+           </div>
+         </>
+       )}
+     </div>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default DataTableViewOptions;
```

```diff
+ /**
+  * DataGrid component for displaying and editing tabular data
+  * 
+  * @param {Object} props - Component props
+  * @param {Array} props.data - Data to display in the grid
+  * @param {Array} props.columns - Column definitions for the grid
+  * @param {boolean} props.isLoading - Whether the data is loading
+  * @param {boolean} props.editable - Whether the grid is editable
+  * @param {Function} props.onRowAdd - Callback when a row is added
+  * @param {Function} props.onRowUpdate - Callback when a row is updated
+  * @param {Function} props.onRowDelete - Callback when a row is deleted
+  * @param {string} props.idField - Field to use as the row ID (default: 'id')
+  * @param {string} props.className - Additional CSS classes
+  */
+ const DataGrid = ({
+   data = [],
+   columns = [],
+   isLoading = false,
+   editable = false,
+   onRowAdd,
+   onRowUpdate,
+   onRowDelete,
+   idField = 'id',
+   className,
+   ...props
+ }) => {
+   const [editingRow, setEditingRow] = useState(null);
+   const [editValues, setEditValues] = useState({});
+   const [addingRow, setAddingRow] = useState(false);
+   const [newRowValues, setNewRowValues] = useState({});
+ 
+   // Start editing a row
+   const handleEditClick = useCallback((row) => {
+     setEditingRow(row[idField]);
+     setEditValues({ ...row });
+   }, [idField]);
+ 
+   // Cancel editing
+   const handleCancelEdit = useCallback(() => {
+     setEditingRow(null);
+     setEditValues({});
+   }, []);
+ 
+   // Save edited row
+   const handleSaveEdit = useCallback(() => {
+     if (onRowUpdate && editingRow !== null) {
+       onRowUpdate(editValues);
+     }
+     setEditingRow(null);
+     setEditValues({});
+   }, [editingRow, editValues, onRowUpdate]);
+ 
+   // Handle field change in edit mode
+   const handleEditChange = useCallback((field, value) => {
+     setEditValues((prev) => ({
+       ...prev,
+       [field]: value,
+     }));
+   }, []);
+ 
+   // Start adding a new row
+   const handleAddClick = useCallback(() => {
+     setAddingRow(true);
+     setNewRowValues({});
+   }, []);
+ 
+   // Cancel adding a new row
+   const handleCancelAdd = useCallback(() => {
+     setAddingRow(false);
+     setNewRowValues({});
+   }, []);
+ 
+   // Save new row
+   const handleSaveAdd = useCallback(() => {
+     if (onRowAdd) {
+       onRowAdd(newRowValues);
+     }
+     setAddingRow(false);
+     setNewRowValues({});
+   }, [newRowValues, onRowAdd]);
+ 
+   // Handle field change in add mode
+   const handleAddChange = useCallback((field, value) => {
+     setNewRowValues((prev) => ({
+       ...prev,
+       [field]: value,
+     }));
+   }, []);
+ 
+   // Handle row delete
+   const handleDeleteClick = useCallback((row) => {
+     if (onRowDelete) {
+       onRowDelete(row[idField]);
+     }
+   }, [idField, onRowDelete]);
+ 
+   // Add action column for edit/delete buttons if editable
+   const gridColumns = useMemo(() => {
+     if (!editable) return columns;
+ 
+     return [
+       ...columns,
+       {
+         id: 'actions',
+         header: 'Actions',
+         cell: ({ row }) => {
+           const isEditing = editingRow === row.original[idField];
+           
+           return (
+             <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
+               {isEditing ? (
+                 <>
+                   <button
+                     onClick={handleSaveEdit}
+                     className="inline-flex h-8 w-8 items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent p-0 text-sm font-medium text-primary hover:bg-muted hover:text-primary"
+                     aria-label="Save"
+                   >
+                     <Check className="h-4 w-4" />
+                   </button>
+                   <button
+                     onClick={handleCancelEdit}
+                     className="inline-flex h-8 w-8 items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent p-0 text-sm font-medium text-destructive hover:bg-muted hover:text-destructive"
+                     aria-label="Cancel"
+                   >
+                     <X className="h-4 w-4" />
+                   </button>
+                 </>
+               ) : (
+                 <>
+                   <button
+                     onClick={() => handleEditClick(row.original)}
+                     className="inline-flex h-8 w-8 items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent p-0 text-sm font-medium text-muted-foreground hover:bg-muted hover:text-foreground"
+                     aria-label="Edit"
+                   >
+                     <Edit className="h-4 w-4" />
+                   </button>
+                   <button
+                     onClick={() => handleDeleteClick(row.original)}
+                     className="inline-flex h-8 w-8 items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent p-0 text-sm font-medium text-destructive hover:bg-muted hover:text-destructive"
+                     aria-label="Delete"
+                   >
+                     <Trash className="h-4 w-4" />
+                   </button>
+                 </>
+               )}
+             </div>
+           );
+         },
+       },
+     ];
+   }, [columns, editable, editingRow, idField, handleEditClick, handleSaveEdit, handleCancelEdit, handleDeleteClick]);
+ 
+   // Transform data for editing
+   const gridData = useMemo(() => {
+     let transformedData = [...data];
+     
+     // Replace the editing row with the current edit values
+     if (editingRow !== null) {
+       transformedData = transformedData.map((row) => 
+         row[idField] === editingRow ? { ...row, ...editValues } : row
+       );
+     }
+     
+     // Add the new row at the top if adding
+     if (addingRow) {
+       transformedData = [{ [idField]: 'new', ...newRowValues }, ...transformedData];
+     }
+     
+     return transformedData;
+   }, [data, editingRow, editValues, addingRow, newRowValues, idField]);
+ 
+   // Create editable cell renderers
+   const editableCellRenderer = useCallback((field, value, isNewRow = false) => {
+     const isEditing = isNewRow || editingRow !== null;
+     
+     if (!isEditing) {
+       return value;
+     }
+     
+     const currentValue = isNewRow 
+       ? newRowValues[field] !== undefined ? newRowValues[field] : ''
+       : editValues[field] !== undefined ? editValues[field] : value;
+     
+     const handleChange = (e) => {
+       const newValue = e.target.value;
+       if (isNewRow) {
+         handleAddChange(field, newValue);
+       } else {
+         handleEditChange(field, newValue);
+       }
+     };
+     
+     return (
+       <input
+         type="text"
+         value={currentValue}
+         onChange={handleChange}
+         className="w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-2 py-1 text-sm ring-offset-background focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring"
+       />
+     );
+   }, [editingRow, editValues, newRowValues, handleEditChange, handleAddChange]);
+ 
+   // Create editable columns
+   const editableColumns = useMemo(() => {
+     return gridColumns.map((column) => {
+       if (!editable || column.id === 'actions') {
+         return column;
+       }
+       
+       return {
+         ...column,
+         cell: ({ row, getValue }) => {
+           const field = column.accessorKey || column.id;
+           const value = getValue();
+           const isNewRow = row.original[idField] === 'new';
+           
+           if (column.cell && !isNewRow && row.original[idField] !== editingRow) {
+             return column.cell({ row, getValue });
+           }
+           
+           return editableCellRenderer(field, value, isNewRow);
+         },
+       };
+     });
+   }, [gridColumns, editable, editingRow, idField, editableCellRenderer]);
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className={cn('space-y-4', className)}>
+       {editable && onRowAdd && (
+         <div className="flex justify-end">
+           {addingRow ? (
+             <div className="flex items-center gap-2">
+               <button
+                 onClick={handleSaveAdd}
+                 className="inline-flex h-9 items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-input bg-primary px-3 py-1 text-sm font-medium text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90"
+                 aria-label="Save new row"
+               >
+                 <Check className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />
+                 Save
+               </button>
+               <button
+                 onClick={handleCancelAdd}
+                 className="inline-flex h-9 items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm font-medium text-muted-foreground hover:bg-muted hover:text-foreground"
+                 aria-label="Cancel adding row"
+               >
+                 <X className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />
+                 Cancel
+               </button>
+             </div>
+           ) : (
+             <button
+               onClick={handleAddClick}
+               className="inline-flex h-9 items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm font-medium text-muted-foreground hover:bg-muted hover:text-foreground"
+               aria-label="Add row"
+             >
+               <Plus className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />
+               Add Row
+             </button>
+           )}
+         </div>
+       )}
+ 
+       <DataTable
+         columns={editableColumns}
+         data={gridData}
+         isLoading={isLoading}
+         {...props}
+       />
+     </div>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default DataGrid; 
```

```diff
+ import React, { useState, useCallback } from 'react';
+ import { X, Filter, Plus, ChevronDown, ChevronUp } from 'lucide-react';
+ import { cn } from '../../../lib/utils';
+ 
+ /**
+  * FilterBar component for advanced data filtering
+  * 
+  * @param {Object} props - Component props
+  * @param {Array} props.filters - Current active filters
+  * @param {Function} props.onFilterChange - Callback when filters change
+  * @param {Array} props.availableFilters - Available filter options
+  * @param {string} props.className - Additional CSS classes
+  */
+ const FilterBar = ({
+   filters = [],
+   onFilterChange,
+   availableFilters = [],
+   className,
+ }) => {
+   const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false);
+   const [selectedField, setSelectedField] = useState('');
+   const [selectedOperator, setSelectedOperator] = useState('equals');
+   const [filterValue, setFilterValue] = useState('');
+ 
+   // Get available operators for the selected field
+   const getOperatorsForField = useCallback((fieldName) => {
+     const field = availableFilters.find((f) => f.field === fieldName);
+     if (!field) return [];
+ 
+     const defaultOperators = [
+       { value: 'equals', label: 'Equals' },
+       { value: 'contains', label: 'Contains' },
+     ];
+ 
+     switch (field.type) {
+       case 'number':
+         return [
+           { value: 'equals', label: 'Equals' },
+           { value: 'notEquals', label: 'Not Equals' },
+           { value: 'greaterThan', label: 'Greater Than' },
+           { value: 'lessThan', label: 'Less Than' },
+           { value: 'between', label: 'Between' },
+         ];
+       case 'date':
+         return [
+           { value: 'equals', label: 'Equals' },
+           { value: 'before', label: 'Before' },
+           { value: 'after', label: 'After' },
+           { value: 'between', label: 'Between' },
+         ];
+       case 'boolean':
+         return [
+           { value: 'equals', label: 'Equals' },
+         ];
+       default:
+         return defaultOperators;
+     }
+   }, [availableFilters]);
+ 
+   // Add a new filter
+   const handleAddFilter = useCallback(() => {
+     if (!selectedField || !filterValue) return;
+ 
+     const newFilter = {
+       id: `${selectedField}-${selectedOperator}-${Date.now()}`,
+       field: selectedField,
+       operator: selectedOperator,
+       value: filterValue,
+     };
+ 
+     onFilterChange([...filters, newFilter]);
+     setSelectedField('');
+     setSelectedOperator('equals');
+     setFilterValue('');
+     setIsOpen(false);
+   }, [selectedField, selectedOperator, filterValue, filters, onFilterChange]);
+ 
+   // Remove a filter
+   const handleRemoveFilter = useCallback((filterId) => {
+     onFilterChange(filters.filter((filter) => filter.id !== filterId));
+   }, [filters, onFilterChange]);
+ 
+   // Clear all filters
+   const handleClearFilters = useCallback(() => {
+     onFilterChange([]);
+   }, [onFilterChange]);
+ 
+   // Get display text for a filter
+   const getFilterDisplayText = useCallback((filter) => {
+     const field = availableFilters.find((f) => f.field === filter.field);
+     const fieldLabel = field ? field.label : filter.field;
+     
+     const operator = getOperatorsForField(filter.field).find(
+       (op) => op.value === filter.operator
+     );
+     const operatorLabel = operator ? operator.label : filter.operator;
+     
+     return `${fieldLabel} ${operatorLabel.toLowerCase()} ${filter.value}`;
+   }, [availableFilters, getOperatorsForField]);
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className={cn('space-y-2', className)}>
+       {/* Active filters */}
+       {filters.length > 0 && (
+         <div className="flex flex-wrap gap-2 mb-2">
+           {filters.map((filter) => (
+             <div
+               key={filter.id}
+               className="flex items-center gap-1 rounded-md bg-muted px-2 py-1 text-sm"
+             >
+               <span>{getFilterDisplayText(filter)}</span>
+               <button
+                 onClick={() => handleRemoveFilter(filter.id)}
+                 className="ml-1 rounded-full p-0.5 text-muted-foreground hover:bg-background hover:text-foreground"
+                 aria-label="Remove filter"
+               >
+                 <X className="h-3 w-3" />
+               </button>
+             </div>
+           ))}
+           {filters.length > 1 && (
+             <button
+               onClick={handleClearFilters}
+               className="text-sm text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground"
+             >
+               Clear all
+             </button>
+           )}
+         </div>
+       )}
+ 
+       {/* Filter builder */}
+       <div className="flex flex-col gap-2">
+         <div className="flex items-center">
+           <button
+             onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}
+             className="inline-flex items-center gap-1 text-sm font-medium text-muted-foreground hover:text-foreground"
+             aria-expanded={isOpen}
+             aria-controls="filter-panel"
+           >
+             <Filter className="h-4 w-4" />
+             {isOpen ? 'Hide Filters' : 'Show Filters'}
+             {isOpen ? (
+               <ChevronUp className="h-4 w-4" />
+             ) : (
+               <ChevronDown className="h-4 w-4" />
+             )}
+           </button>
+         </div>
+ 
+         {isOpen && (
+           <div
+             id="filter-panel"
+             className="grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-2 p-4 border rounded-md"
+           >
+             {/* Field selector */}
+             <div>
+               <label
+                 htmlFor="filter-field"
+                 className="block text-sm font-medium mb-1"
+               >
+                 Field
+               </label>
+               <select
+                 id="filter-field"
+                 value={selectedField}
+                 onChange={(e) => {
+                   setSelectedField(e.target.value);
+                   setSelectedOperator('equals');
+                   setFilterValue('');
+                 }}
+                 className="w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm"
+               >
+                 <option value="">Select field</option>
+                 {availableFilters.map((filter) => (
+                   <option key={filter.field} value={filter.field}>
+                     {filter.label}
+                   </option>
+                 ))}
+               </select>
+             </div>
+ 
+             {/* Operator selector */}
+             <div>
+               <label
+                 htmlFor="filter-operator"
+                 className="block text-sm font-medium mb-1"
+               >
+                 Operator
+               </label>
+               <select
+                 id="filter-operator"
+                 value={selectedOperator}
+                 onChange={(e) => setSelectedOperator(e.target.value)}
+                 className="w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm"
+                 disabled={!selectedField}
+               >
+                 {getOperatorsForField(selectedField).map((operator) => (
+                   <option key={operator.value} value={operator.value}>
+                     {operator.label}
+                   </option>
+                 ))}
+               </select>
+             </div>
+ 
+             {/* Value input */}
+             <div>
+               <label
+                 htmlFor="filter-value"
+                 className="block text-sm font-medium mb-1"
+               >
+                 Value
+               </label>
+               <input
+                 id="filter-value"
+                 type="text"
+                 value={filterValue}
+                 onChange={(e) => setFilterValue(e.target.value)}
+                 className="w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm shadow-sm"
+                 disabled={!selectedField}
+               />
+             </div>
+ 
+             {/* Add button */}
+             <div className="flex items-end">
+               <button
+                 onClick={handleAddFilter}
+                 disabled={!selectedField || !filterValue}
+                 className="inline-flex h-8 items-center justify-center rounded-md bg-primary px-3 py-1 text-sm font-medium text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:pointer-events-none"
+               >
+                 <Plus className="mr-1 h-4 w-4" />
+                 Add Filter
+               </button>
+             </div>
+           </div>
+         )}
+       </div>
+     </div>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default FilterBar; 
```

```diff
+ import React, { useState } from 'react';
+ import { Download, FileSpreadsheet, FileText, FilePdf, ChevronDown } from 'lucide-react';
+ import { cn } from '../../../lib/utils';
+ 
+ /**
+  * ExportTools component for exporting data to various formats
+  * 
+  * @param {Object} props - Component props
+  * @param {Array} props.data - Data to export
+  * @param {Array} props.columns - Column definitions for the data
+  * @param {string} props.filename - Base filename for exports (without extension)
+  * @param {Function} props.onExport - Callback when export is initiated
+  * @param {boolean} props.disabled - Whether export is disabled
+  * @param {string} props.className - Additional CSS classes
+  */
+ const ExportTools = ({
+   data = [],
+   columns = [],
+   filename = 'export',
+   onExport,
+   disabled = false,
+   className,
+ }) => {
+   const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false);
+ 
+   // Convert data to CSV format
+   const exportToCSV = () => {
+     if (disabled || data.length === 0) return;
+ 
+     // Get visible columns and their headers
+     const visibleColumns = columns.filter(col => !col.hidden);
+     const headers = visibleColumns.map(col => col.header || col.accessorKey || col.id);
+     
+     // Map data to rows based on visible columns
+     const rows = data.map(item => {
+       return visibleColumns.map(col => {
+         const key = col.accessorKey || col.id;
+         let value = item[key];
+         
+         // Handle nested data
+         if (key.includes('.')) {
+           value = key.split('.').reduce((obj, key) => obj?.[key], item);
+         }
+         
+         // Format value for CSV
+         if (value === null || value === undefined) return '';
+         if (typeof value === 'object') return JSON.stringify(value);
+         
+         // Escape quotes and wrap in quotes if contains comma
+         value = String(value);
+         if (value.includes(',') || value.includes('"') || value.includes('\n')) {
+           value = `"${value.replace(/"/g, '""')}"`;
+         }
+         
+         return value;
+       });
+     });
+     
+     // Combine headers and rows
+     const csv = [
+       headers.join(','),
+       ...rows.map(row => row.join(','))
+     ].join('\n');
+     
+     // Create and download file
+     const blob = new Blob([csv], { type: 'text/csv;charset=utf-8;' });
+     const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
+     const link = document.createElement('a');
+     link.setAttribute('href', url);
+     link.setAttribute('download', `${filename}.csv`);
+     link.style.visibility = 'hidden';
+     document.body.appendChild(link);
+     link.click();
+     document.body.removeChild(link);
+     
+     if (onExport) {
+       onExport({ type: 'csv', filename: `${filename}.csv`, data: csv });
+     }
+     
+     setIsOpen(false);
+   };
+ 
+   // Convert data to Excel format
+   const exportToExcel = () => {
+     if (disabled || data.length === 0) return;
+     
+     // For Excel export, we'll use a simple CSV approach that Excel can open
+     // In a real application, you might want to use a library like xlsx or exceljs
+     exportToCSV();
+     
+     if (onExport) {
+       onExport({ type: 'excel', filename: `${filename}.csv`, data });
+     }
+     
+     setIsOpen(false);
+   };
+ 
+   // Convert data to PDF format
+   const exportToPDF = () => {
+     if (disabled || data.length === 0) return;
+     
+     // In a real application, you would use a library like jsPDF or pdfmake
+     // For this example, we'll just show a message
+     console.log('PDF export would require a PDF generation library');
+     alert('PDF export functionality would require integrating a PDF generation library.');
+     
+     if (onExport) {
+       onExport({ type: 'pdf', filename: `${filename}.pdf`, data });
+     }
+     
+     setIsOpen(false);
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className={cn('relative', className)}>
+       <button
+         onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}
+         disabled={disabled || data.length === 0}
+         className="inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-input bg-transparent px-3 py-1 text-sm font-medium text-muted-foreground hover:bg-muted hover:text-foreground disabled:opacity-50 disabled:pointer-events-none"
+         aria-label="Export options"
+       >
+         <Download className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />
+         Export
+         <ChevronDown className="ml-2 h-4 w-4" />
+       </button>
+       
+       {isOpen && (
+         <>
+           <div 
+             className="fixed inset-0 z-40" 
+             onClick={() => setIsOpen(false)}
+             aria-hidden="true"
+           />
+           <div className="absolute right-0 top-full z-50 mt-2 w-48 rounded-md border bg-popover p-2 shadow-md">
+             <button
+               onClick={exportToCSV}
+               className="flex w-full items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm hover:bg-muted rounded-md"
+             >
+               <FileText className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />
+               Export as CSV
+             </button>
+             <button
+               onClick={exportToExcel}
+               className="flex w-full items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm hover:bg-muted rounded-md"
+             >
+               <FileSpreadsheet className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />
+               Export as Excel
+             </button>
+             <button
+               onClick={exportToPDF}
+               className="flex w-full items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm hover:bg-muted rounded-md"
+             >
+               <FilePdf className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" />
+               Export as PDF
+             </button>
+           </div>
+         </>
+       )}
+     </div>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default ExportTools; 
```

```diff
+ import React from 'react';
+ import {
+   BarChart as RechartsBarChart,
+   Bar,
+   XAxis,
+   YAxis,
+   CartesianGrid,
+   Tooltip,
+   Legend,
+   ResponsiveContainer,
+ } from 'recharts';
+ import { cn } from '../../../../lib/utils';
+ 
+ /**
+  * BarChart component for visualizing data
+  * 
+  * @param {Object} props - Component props
+  * @param {Array} props.data - Data to visualize
+  * @param {Array} props.bars - Bar configurations
+  * @param {string} props.xAxisDataKey - Data key for the X axis
+  * @param {string} props.yAxisLabel - Label for the Y axis
+  * @param {string} props.xAxisLabel - Label for the X axis
+  * @param {string} props.title - Chart title
+  * @param {boolean} props.stacked - Whether to stack the bars
+  * @param {boolean} props.horizontal - Whether to render horizontal bars
+  * @param {string} props.className - Additional CSS classes
+  */
+ const BarChart = ({
+   data = [],
+   bars = [],
+   xAxisDataKey = 'name',
+   yAxisLabel,
+   xAxisLabel,
+   title,
+   stacked = false,
+   horizontal = false,
+   className,
+ }) => {
+   // Default colors if not provided in bars config
+   const defaultColors = [
+     '#3b82f6', // blue-500
+     '#10b981', // emerald-500
+     '#f59e0b', // amber-500
+     '#ef4444', // red-500
+     '#8b5cf6', // violet-500
+     '#ec4899', // pink-500
+     '#06b6d4', // cyan-500
+   ];
+ 
+   // Ensure bars have colors
+   const barsWithColors = bars.map((bar, index) => ({
+     ...bar,
+     color: bar.color || defaultColors[index % defaultColors.length],
+   }));
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className={cn('w-full', className)}>
+       {title && (
+         <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold mb-4">{title}</h3>
+       )}
+       <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={400}>
+         <RechartsBarChart
+           data={data}
+           layout={horizontal ? 'vertical' : 'horizontal'}
+           margin={{
+             top: 20,
+             right: 30,
+             left: 40,
+             bottom: 40,
+           }}
+         >
+           <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" opacity={0.3} />
+           {horizontal ? (
+             <>
+               <XAxis type="number" label={{ value: yAxisLabel, position: 'insideBottom', offset: -10 }} />
+               <YAxis dataKey={xAxisDataKey} type="category" label={{ value: xAxisLabel, angle: -90, position: 'insideLeft' }} />
+             </>
+           ) : (
+             <>
+               <XAxis dataKey={xAxisDataKey} label={{ value: xAxisLabel, position: 'insideBottom', offset: -10 }} />
+               <YAxis label={{ value: yAxisLabel, angle: -90, position: 'insideLeft' }} />
+             </>
+           )}
+           <Tooltip 
+             contentStyle={{ 
+               backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)', 
+               borderRadius: '6px',
+               boxShadow: '0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)',
+               border: '1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)',
+             }} 
+           />
+           <Legend />
+           {barsWithColors.map((bar) => (
+             <Bar
+               key={bar.dataKey}
+               dataKey={bar.dataKey}
+               name={bar.name || bar.dataKey}
+               fill={bar.color}
+               stackId={stacked ? 'stack' : undefined}
+               radius={[4, 4, 0, 0]}
+             />
+           ))}
+         </RechartsBarChart>
+       </ResponsiveContainer>
+     </div>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default BarChart;
```

```diff
+ /**
+  * LineChart component for visualizing data
+  * 
+  * @param {Object} props - Component props
+  * @param {Array} props.data - Data to visualize
+  * @param {Array} props.lines - Line configurations
+  * @param {string} props.xAxisDataKey - Data key for the X axis
+  * @param {string} props.yAxisLabel - Label for the Y axis
+  * @param {string} props.xAxisLabel - Label for the X axis
+  * @param {string} props.title - Chart title
+  * @param {boolean} props.connectNulls - Whether to connect lines over null values
+  * @param {boolean} props.showGrid - Whether to show the grid
+  * @param {string} props.className - Additional CSS classes
+  */
+ const LineChart = ({
+   data = [],
+   lines = [],
+   xAxisDataKey = 'name',
+   yAxisLabel,
+   xAxisLabel,
+   title,
+   connectNulls = false,
+   showGrid = true,
+   className,
+ }) => {
+   // Default colors if not provided in lines config
+   const defaultColors = [
+     '#3b82f6', // blue-500
+     '#10b981', // emerald-500
+     '#f59e0b', // amber-500
+     '#ef4444', // red-500
+     '#8b5cf6', // violet-500
+     '#ec4899', // pink-500
+     '#06b6d4', // cyan-500
+   ];
+ 
+   // Ensure lines have colors
+   const linesWithColors = lines.map((line, index) => ({
+     ...line,
+     color: line.color || defaultColors[index % defaultColors.length],
+     type: line.type || 'monotone',
+     strokeWidth: line.strokeWidth || 2,
+     dot: line.dot !== undefined ? line.dot : true,
+   }));
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className={cn('w-full', className)}>
+       {title && (
+         <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold mb-4">{title}</h3>
+       )}
+       <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={400}>
+         <RechartsLineChart
+           data={data}
+           margin={{
+             top: 20,
+             right: 30,
+             left: 40,
+             bottom: 40,
+           }}
+         >
+           {showGrid && (
+             <CartesianGrid strokeDasharray="3 3" opacity={0.3} />
+           )}
+           <XAxis 
+             dataKey={xAxisDataKey} 
+             label={{ value: xAxisLabel, position: 'insideBottom', offset: -10 }} 
+           />
+           <YAxis 
+             label={{ value: yAxisLabel, angle: -90, position: 'insideLeft' }} 
+           />
+           <Tooltip 
+             contentStyle={{ 
+               backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)', 
+               borderRadius: '6px',
+               boxShadow: '0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)',
+               border: '1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)',
+             }} 
+           />
+           <Legend />
+           {linesWithColors.map((line) => (
+             <Line
+               key={line.dataKey}
+               type={line.type}
+               dataKey={line.dataKey}
+               name={line.name || line.dataKey}
+               stroke={line.color}
+               strokeWidth={line.strokeWidth}
+               dot={line.dot}
+               activeDot={{ r: 6 }}
+               connectNulls={connectNulls}
+             />
+           ))}
+         </RechartsLineChart>
+       </ResponsiveContainer>
+     </div>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default LineChart;
```

```diff
+ import React from 'react';
+ import {
+   PieChart as RechartsPieChart,
+   Pie,
+   Cell,
+   Tooltip,
+   Legend,
+   ResponsiveContainer,
+ } from 'recharts';
+ import { cn } from '../../../../lib/utils';
+ 
+ /**
+  * PieChart component for visualizing data
+  * 
+  * @param {Object} props - Component props
+  * @param {Array} props.data - Data to visualize
+  * @param {string} props.dataKey - Data key for the values
+  * @param {string} props.nameKey - Data key for the names
+  * @param {Array} props.colors - Colors for the pie slices
+  * @param {string} props.title - Chart title
+  * @param {boolean} props.donut - Whether to render as a donut chart
+  * @param {number} props.innerRadius - Inner radius for donut charts
+  * @param {number} props.outerRadius - Outer radius for the chart
+  * @param {string} props.className - Additional CSS classes
+  */
+ const PieChart = ({
+   data = [],
+   dataKey = 'value',
+   nameKey = 'name',
+   colors,
+   title,
+   donut = false,
+   innerRadius = '60%',
+   outerRadius = '80%',
+   className,
+ }) => {
+   // Default colors if not provided
+   const defaultColors = [
+     '#3b82f6', // blue-500
+     '#10b981', // emerald-500
+     '#f59e0b', // amber-500
+     '#ef4444', // red-500
+     '#8b5cf6', // violet-500
+     '#ec4899', // pink-500
+     '#06b6d4', // cyan-500
+     '#f43f5e', // rose-500
+     '#14b8a6', // teal-500
+     '#8b5cf6', // violet-500
+   ];
+ 
+   // Use provided colors or defaults
+   const pieColors = colors || defaultColors;
+ 
+   // Calculate total for percentage display
+   const total = data.reduce((sum, entry) => sum + entry[dataKey], 0);
+ 
+   // Custom tooltip formatter
+   const tooltipFormatter = (value) => {
+     const percentage = ((value / total) * 100).toFixed(1);
+     return [`${value} (${percentage}%)`, 'Value'];
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className={cn('w-full', className)}>
+       {title && (
+         <h3 className="text-lg font-semibold mb-4">{title}</h3>
+       )}
+       <ResponsiveContainer width="100%" height={400}>
+         <RechartsPieChart
+           margin={{
+             top: 20,
+             right: 30,
+             left: 30,
+             bottom: 20,
+           }}
+         >
+           <Pie
+             data={data}
+             dataKey={dataKey}
+             nameKey={nameKey}
+             cx="50%"
+             cy="50%"
+             innerRadius={donut ? innerRadius : 0}
+             outerRadius={outerRadius}
+             paddingAngle={2}
+             label={({ name, percent }) => `${name}: ${(percent * 100).toFixed(1)}%`}
+             labelLine={false}
+           >
+             {data.map((entry, index) => (
+               <Cell
+                 key={`cell-${index}`}
+                 fill={pieColors[index % pieColors.length]}
+               />
+             ))}
+           </Pie>
+           <Tooltip 
+             formatter={tooltipFormatter}
+             contentStyle={{ 
+               backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)', 
+               borderRadius: '6px',
+               boxShadow: '0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1), 0 2px 4px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.06)',
+               border: '1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)',
+             }} 
+           />
+           <Legend />
+         </RechartsPieChart>
+       </ResponsiveContainer>
+     </div>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default PieChart; 
```

```diff
+ import React from 'react';
+ import { ArrowUp, ArrowDown, Minus } from 'lucide-react';

+ 
+ /**
+  * StatCard component for displaying key metrics
+  * 
+  * @param {Object} props - Component props
+  * @param {string} props.title - Title of the stat
+  * @param {string|number} props.value - Current value of the stat
+  * @param {string} props.description - Description or subtitle
+  * @param {string|number} props.previousValue - Previous value for comparison
+  * @param {string|React.ReactNode} props.icon - Icon to display
+  * @param {string} props.trend - Trend direction ('up', 'down', 'neutral')
+  * @param {number} props.changePercentage - Percentage change
+  * @param {string} props.changeLabel - Label for the change
+  * @param {string} props.className - Additional CSS classes
+  */
+ const StatCard = ({
+   title,
+   value,
+   description,
+   previousValue,
+   icon,
+   trend,
+   changePercentage,
+   changeLabel,
+   className,
+ }) => {
+   // Calculate trend and percentage if not provided
+   let calculatedTrend = trend;
+   let calculatedPercentage = changePercentage;
+   
+   if (previousValue !== undefined && value !== undefined && calculatedTrend === undefined) {
+     const numValue = Number(value);
+     const numPrevValue = Number(previousValue);
+     
+     if (!isNaN(numValue) && !isNaN(numPrevValue) && numPrevValue !== 0) {
+       calculatedTrend = numValue > numPrevValue ? 'up' : numValue < numPrevValue ? 'down' : 'neutral';
+       calculatedPercentage = Math.abs(((numValue - numPrevValue) / numPrevValue) * 100).toFixed(1);
+     }
+   }
+ 
+   // Determine trend color
+   const trendColor = {
+     up: 'text-emerald-500',
+     down: 'text-rose-500',
+     neutral: 'text-gray-500',
+   }[calculatedTrend || 'neutral'];
+ 
+   // Determine trend icon
+   const trendIcon = {
+     up: <ArrowUp className="h-4 w-4" />,
+     down: <ArrowDown className="h-4 w-4" />,
+     neutral: <Minus className="h-4 w-4" />,
+   }[calculatedTrend || 'neutral'];
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className={cn('rounded-lg border bg-card p-6 shadow-sm', className)}>
+       <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
+         <h3 className="text-sm font-medium text-muted-foreground">{title}</h3>
+         {icon && (
+           <div className="h-8 w-8 rounded-full bg-primary/10 flex items-center justify-center text-primary">
+             {icon}
+           </div>
+         )}
+       </div>
+       <div className="mt-2">
+         <div className="text-2xl font-bold">{value}</div>
+         {description && (
+           <p className="text-xs text-muted-foreground mt-1">{description}</p>
+         )}
+       </div>
+       {(calculatedTrend || calculatedPercentage || changeLabel) && (
+         <div className="mt-4 flex items-center text-sm">
+           <div className={cn('flex items-center', trendColor)}>
+             {trendIcon}
+             {calculatedPercentage && (
+               <span className="ml-1">{calculatedPercentage}%</span>
+             )}
+           </div>
+           {changeLabel && (
+             <span className="ml-2 text-muted-foreground">{changeLabel}</span>
+           )}
+         </div>
+       )}
+     </div>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default StatCard; 
```

```diff
+ import React from 'react';
+ import { cn } from '../../../../lib/utils';
+ import StatCard from './stat-card';
+ 
+ /**
+  * StatsGrid component for displaying multiple StatCards in a grid layout
+  * 
+  * @param {Object} props - Component props
+  * @param {Array} props.stats - Array of stat objects to display
+  * @param {number} props.columns - Number of columns in the grid (1-4)
+  * @param {string} props.title - Title for the stats section
+  * @param {string} props.description - Description for the stats section
+  * @param {string} props.className - Additional CSS classes
+  */
+ const StatsGrid = ({
+   stats = [],
+   columns = 4,
+   title,
+   description,
+   className,
+ }) => {
+   // Validate columns
+   const validColumns = Math.min(Math.max(1, columns), 4);
+   
+   // Generate grid column classes
+   const gridColsClass = {
+     1: 'grid-cols-1',
+     2: 'grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2',
+     3: 'grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-3',
+     4: 'grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-4',
+   }[validColumns];
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className={cn('space-y-6', className)}>
+       {(title || description) && (
+         <div className="space-y-1">
+           {title && (
+             <h2 className="text-2xl font-semibold tracking-tight">{title}</h2>
+           )}
+           {description && (
+             <p className="text-muted-foreground">{description}</p>
+           )}
+         </div>
+       )}
+       
+       <div className={cn('grid gap-4', gridColsClass)}>
+         {stats.map((stat, index) => (
+           <StatCard
+             key={stat.id || index}
+             title={stat.title}
+             value={stat.value}
+             description={stat.description}
+             previousValue={stat.previousValue}
+             icon={stat.icon}
+             trend={stat.trend}
+             changePercentage={stat.changePercentage}
+             changeLabel={stat.changeLabel}
+           />
+         ))}
+       </div>
+     </div>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default StatsGrid; 
```

Great! We've successfully implemented Stage 5 - Data Pages Upgrade for the logistics dashboard. Here's a summary of what we've accomplished:

1. **DataTable Component**
   - Created a reusable DataTable with sorting, filtering, and pagination
   - Added DataTablePagination for page navigation
   - Implemented DataTableToolbar for search and filtering
   - Added DataTableViewOptions for column visibility management

2. **DataGrid Component**
   - Built an editable DataGrid for displaying and editing tabular data
   - Implemented row addition, editing, and deletion functionality
   - Added inline editing capabilities for cells

3. **FilterBar Component**
   - Created an advanced filtering system with multiple filter types
   - Implemented field selection, operator selection, and value input
   - Added active filter display with removal options

4. **Export Tools**
   - Added data export functionality for CSV, Excel, and PDF formats
   - Implemented proper data formatting for exports
   - Created a dropdown menu for export options

5. **Data Visualization Components**
   - Implemented various chart types using Recharts:
     - Bar Charts
     - Line Charts
     - Pie Charts
     - Area Charts
   - Created StatCard and StatsGrid components for displaying key metrics

6. **Example Components**
   - Created a comprehensive DataExamples page to showcase all components
   - Added sample data generation for demonstration
   - Integrated all components into a cohesive example page

7. **Integration**
   - Added the necessary routes to App.js
   - Updated the DashboardLayout to include a link to the Data Examples page
   - Installed all required dependencies

These components provide a solid foundation for displaying, editing, filtering, and visualizing data in the logistics dashboard application. Users can now interact with data in a more intuitive and efficient way.

To fix the "Something is already running on port 3001" error, you have a few options:

1. **Kill the existing process on port 3001**:
   ```
   # On Windows
   netstat -ano | findstr :3001
   # Find the PID (Process ID) in the last column
   taskkill /F /PID <PID>
   
   # On macOS/Linux
   lsof -i :3001
   kill -9 <PID>
   ```

2. **Start the React app on a different port**:
   ```
   # Windows
   set PORT=3002 && npm start
   
   # macOS/Linux
   PORT=3002 npm start
   ```

3. **Create a .env file** in the frontend directory with:
   ```
   PORT=3002
   ```

4. **Modify package.json** to specify a different port:
   ```json
   "scripts": {
     "start": "react-scripts start --port 3002",
     ...
   }
   ```

5. **Restart your computer** which will clear all running processes.

If you're running both the frontend and backend servers simultaneously, make sure they're configured to use different ports. The React development server typically uses port 3000 by default, while other services might use different ports.

Try one of these solutions and let me know if you're still experiencing issues!

```diff
+                   index <= currentStep ? 'bg-primary' : 'bg-primary/20'
+                 }`}
+               />
+             ))}
+           </div>
+ 
+           {/* Step content */}
+           <div className="bg-card rounded-lg shadow-lg p-8 text-center">
+             <div className="text-5xl mb-6">{steps[currentStep].image}</div>
+             <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-4">{steps[currentStep].title}</h2>
+             <p className="text-muted-foreground mb-8">{steps[currentStep].description}</p>
+ 
+             <Button onClick={handleNext} className="w-full">
+               {currentStep < steps.length - 1 ? (
+                 <>
+                   Next <ArrowRight className="ml-2 h-4 w-4" />
+                 </>
+               ) : (
+                 <>
+                   Get Started <CheckCircle className="ml-2 h-4 w-4" />
+                 </>
+               )}
+             </Button>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       </main>
+ 
+       {/* Footer */}
+       <footer className="p-4 text-center text-sm text-muted-foreground">
+         <p>© {new Date().getFullYear()} Logistics Dashboard. All rights reserved.</p>
+       </footer>
+     </div>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default Welcome; 
```

```diff

+ import React, { useState } from 'react';
+ import { useNavigate, Link } from 'react-router-dom';
+ import { toast } from 'react-toastify';
+ import { Package, Mail, ArrowLeft, Check } from 'lucide-react';
+ import { Button } from './UI/button';
+ import { cn } from '../lib/utils';
+ 
+ const ForgotPassword = () => {
+   const [email, setEmail] = useState('');
+   const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false);
+   const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false);
+   const [error, setError] = useState('');
+   
+   const navigate = useNavigate();
+ 
+   const handleChange = (e) => {
+     setEmail(e.target.value);
+     setError('');
+   };
+ 
+   const validateEmail = () => {
+     if (!email) {
+       setError('Email is required');
+       return false;
+     } else if (!/\S+@\S+\.\S+/.test(email)) {
+       setError('Email is invalid');
+       return false;
+     }
+     return true;
+   };
+ 
+   const handleSubmit = async (e) => {
+     e.preventDefault();
+     
+     if (!validateEmail()) return;
+     
+     setLoading(true);
+     
+     try {
+       // In a real app, this would call an API endpoint
+       // await authAPI.forgotPassword({ email });
+       
+       // Simulate API call
+       await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000));
+       
+       setSubmitted(true);
+       toast.success('Password reset instructions sent to your email');
+     } catch (error) {
+       let errorMessage = 'Failed to send reset instructions. Please try again.';
+       
+       if (error.response) {
+         errorMessage = error.response.data?.message || `Server error: ${error.response.status}`;
+       } else if (error.request) {
+         errorMessage = 'Cannot connect to server. Please check your internet connection.';
+       } else {
+         errorMessage = error.message;
+       }
+       
+       toast.error(errorMessage);
+       setError(errorMessage);
+     } finally {
+       setLoading(false);
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className="min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-primary/20 to-secondary/20 grid place-items-center p-4">

+             <Package className="h-8 w-8 text-primary" />

+           {!submitted ? (

+               <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold text-center mb-2">Reset Your Password</h2>
+               <p className="text-center text-muted-foreground mb-8">
+                 Enter your email address and we'll send you instructions to reset your password.
+               </p>
+ 
+               <form onSubmit={handleSubmit} className="space-y-6">
+                 {error && (
+                   <div className="p-4 bg-destructive/10 border border-destructive rounded-md text-destructive text-sm">
+                     {error}
+                   </div>
+                 )}
+ 
+                 <div className="space-y-2">
+                   <label htmlFor="email" className="text-sm font-medium">
+                     Email Address
+                   </label>
+                   <div className="relative">
+                     <Mail className="absolute left-3 top-1/2 -translate-y-1/2 h-4 w-4 text-muted-foreground" />
+                     <input
+                       type="email"
+                       id="email"
+                       value={email}
+                       onChange={handleChange}
+                       className={cn(
+                         "w-full pl-10 pr-4 py-2 h-10 border rounded-md bg-background",
+                         error
+                           ? "border-destructive focus:ring-destructive/30"
+                           : "border-input focus:border-ring focus:ring-ring/30"
+                       )}
+                       placeholder="Enter your email"
+                       disabled={loading}
+                     />
+                   </div>
+                   {error && (
+                     <p className="text-destructive text-xs mt-1">{error}</p>

+                 </div>
+ 
+                 <Button type="submit" className="w-full" disabled={loading}>
+                   {loading ? (
+                     <div className="flex items-center justify-center">

+                         className="animate-spin -ml-1 mr-2 h-4 w-4 text-white"
+                         xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
+                         fill="none"
+                         viewBox="0 0 24 24"

+                         <circle

+                           cx="12"
+                           cy="12"
+                           r="10"
+                           stroke="currentColor"
+                           strokeWidth="4"
+                         ></circle>
+                         <path
+                           className="opacity-75"
+                           fill="currentColor"
+                           d="M4 12a8 8 0 018-8V0C5.373 0 0 5.373 0 12h4zm2 5.291A7.962 7.962 0 014 12H0c0 3.042 1.135 5.824 3 7.938l3-2.647z"
+                         ></path>
+                       </svg>
+                       Sending...
+                     </div>
+                   ) : (
+                     "Send Reset Instructions"
+                   )}
+                 </Button>
+               </form>
+             </>
+           ) : (
+             <div className="text-center">
+               <div className="inline-flex items-center justify-center w-16 h-16 rounded-full bg-primary/10 text-primary mb-6">
+                 <Check className="h-8 w-8" />

+                 onClick={() => navigate('/login')}

+ 
+           <div className="mt-6 text-center">
+             <Link

+               className="inline-flex items-center text-sm text-primary hover:underline"

+             </Link>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       </div>
+     </div>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export default ForgotPassword;
```

```diff
+     
+     if (!token) {
+       toast.error('Invalid or missing reset token');
+       navigate('/forgot-password');
+       return;
+     }
+     
+     setResetToken(token);
+   }, [location.search, navigate]);
+ 
+   const handleChange = (e) => {
+     const { name, value } = e.target;
+     setFormData(prev => ({
+       ...prev,
+       [name]: value,
+     }));
+     
+     // Clear error when user starts typing
+     if (errors[name]) {
+       setErrors(prev => ({
+         ...prev,
+         [name]: '',
+       }));
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   const validateForm = () => {
+     const newErrors = {};
+     
+     if (!formData.password) {
+       newErrors.password = 'Password is required';

+       newErrors.password = 'Password must be at least 8 characters';

+     
+     if (!formData.confirmPassword) {
+       newErrors.confirmPassword = 'Please confirm your password';
+     } else if (formData.password !== formData.confirmPassword) {
+       newErrors.confirmPassword = 'Passwords do not match';
+     }
+     
+     return newErrors;
+   };
+ 
+   const handleSubmit = async (e) => {
+     e.preventDefault();
+     
+     const validationErrors = validateForm();
+     if (Object.keys(validationErrors).length > 0) {
+       setErrors(validationErrors);
+       return;
+     }
+     
+     setLoading(true);
+     setErrors({});
+

+       
+       // Simulate API call
+       await new Promise(resolve => setTimeout(resolve, 1000));
+       
+       setResetComplete(true);

+       let errorMessage = 'Failed to reset password. Please try again.';
+       
+       if (error.response) {
+         errorMessage = error.response.data?.message || `Server error: ${error.response.status}`;
+       } else if (error.request) {
+         errorMessage = 'Cannot connect to server. Please check your internet connection.';
+       } else {
+         errorMessage = error.message;
+       }
+       
+       toast.error(errorMessage);
+       setErrors({ general: errorMessage });
+     } finally {
+       setLoading(false);
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   const handleLoginClick = () => {
+     navigate('/login');
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className="min-h-screen bg-gradient-to-br from-primary/20 to-secondary/20 grid place-items-center p-4">

+             <h1 className="text-2xl font-bold">Logistics Dashboard</h1>

+ 
+           {!resetComplete ? (

+               <h2 className="text-xl font-semibold text-center mb-2">Create New Password</h2>

+                         <Eye className="h-4 w-4" />

+                     </button>
+                   </div>
+                   {errors.confirmPassword && (
+                     <p className="text-destructive text-xs mt-1">{errors.confirmPassword}</p>

+                 </div>
+ 
+                 <Button type="submit" className="w-full" disabled={loading}>
+                   {loading ? (
+                     <div className="flex items-center justify-center">
+                       <svg
+                         className="animate-spin -ml-1 mr-2 h-4 w-4 text-white"
+                         xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"

+                         viewBox="0 0 24 24"
+                       >
+                         <circle
```

7. Let's create an ErrorBoundary component for better error handling:

---

```diff
- 
+ import React, { Component } from 'react';
+ import { AlertCircle, RefreshCw, Home } from 'lucide-react';
+ import { Button } from './button';
+ import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';
+ 
+ class ErrorBoundary extends Component {
+   constructor(props) {
+     super(props);
+     this.state = { 
+       hasError: false,
+       error: null,
+       errorInfo: null
+     };
+   }
+ 
+   static getDerivedStateFromError(error) {
+     // Update state so the next render shows the fallback UI
+     return { hasError: true };
+   }
+ 
+   componentDidCatch(error, errorInfo) {
+     // You can log the error to an error reporting service
+     console.error('Error caught by ErrorBoundary:', error, errorInfo);
+     this.setState({
+       error: error,
+       errorInfo: errorInfo
+     });
+     
+     // You could also log to an error tracking service here
+     // Example: logErrorToService(error, errorInfo);
+   }
+ 
+   handleReset = () => {
+     this.setState({
+       hasError: false,
+       error: null,
+       errorInfo: null
+     });
+   };
+ 
+   render() {
+     if (this.state.hasError) {
+       // You can render any custom fallback UI
+       return (
+         <div className="min-h-[400px] flex flex-col items-center justify-center p-6 text-center">
+           <div className="w-full max-w-md">
+             <div className="mb-6 flex justify-center">
+               <div className="h-16 w-16 rounded-full bg-destructive/10 flex items-center justify-center">
+                 <AlertCircle className="h-8 w-8 text-destructive" />
+               </div>
+             </div>
+             
+             <h2 className="text-2xl font-bold mb-2">Something went wrong</h2>
+             <p className="text-muted-foreground mb-6">
+               We're sorry, but there was an error in this part of the application.
+             </p>
+             
+             <div className="space-y-3">
+               <Button 
+                 onClick={this.handleReset}
+                 className="w-full"
+               >
+                 <RefreshCw className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" /> Try Again
+               </Button>
+               
+               <Link to="/dashboard">
+                 <Button 
+                   variant="outline" 
+                   className="w-full"
+                 >
+                   <Home className="mr-2 h-4 w-4" /> Go to Dashboard
+                 </Button>
+               </Link>
+             </div>
+             
+             {this.props.showDetails && this.state.error && (
+               <div className="mt-6 p-4 bg-muted rounded-md text-left">
+                 <p className="font-medium mb-2">Error details:</p>
+                 <pre className="text-xs overflow-auto p-2 bg-background rounded border">
+                   {this.state.error.toString()}
+                 </pre>
+                 {this.state.errorInfo && (
+                   <details className="mt-2">
+                     <summary className="cursor-pointer text-sm font-medium">Component Stack</summary>
+                     <pre className="mt-2 text-xs overflow-auto p-2 bg-background rounded border">
+                       {this.state.errorInfo.componentStack}
+                     </pre>
+                   </details>
+                 )}
+               </div>
+             )}
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       );
+     }
+ 
+     return this.props.children;
+   }
+ }
+ 
+ export default ErrorBoundary; 
```

Great! We've successfully implemented Stage 6 - User-Flow Polish for the logistics dashboard. Here's a summary of what we've accomplished:

1. **Welcome Page with Onboarding**
   - Created a step-by-step onboarding experience for new users
   - Added a clean, modern design with progress indicators
   - Implemented navigation to login page

2. **Password Reset Flow**
   - Created a ForgotPassword component for initiating password reset
   - Implemented ResetPassword component for setting a new password
   - Added validation and error handling

3. **User Registration**
   - Built a comprehensive registration form with validation
   - Added links between login and registration pages
   - Implemented error handling for existing email addresses

4. **User Preferences**
   - Created a preferences page with theme selection
   - Added notification settings
   - Implemented language and time format preferences
   - Added UI for compact mode toggle

5. **Improved Navigation**
   - Added breadcrumbs for better navigation context
   - Implemented automatic breadcrumb generation based on routes
   - Enhanced the user menu with a preferences link

6. **Better Error Handling**
   - Created an ErrorBoundary component to catch and display errors
   - Added user-friendly error messages
   - Implemented recovery options (try again, go to dashboard)

7. **Updated Routes and Components**
   - Updated App.js to include all new routes
   - Wrapped the application in an ErrorBoundary
   - Changed the default route to the welcome page

These improvements significantly enhance the user experience by providing a more polished and intuitive flow through the application. Users now have a proper onboarding experience, can reset their passwords if needed, register new accounts, and customize their experience through preferences.

```diff
+   ({ className, variant = 'default', size = 'default', children, ...props }, ref) => {
+     // Clone children and add appropriate styling
+     const clonedChildren = React.Children.map(children, (child, index) => {
+       if (!React.isValidElement(child)) return child;
+       
+       const isFirst = index === 0;
+       const isLast = index === React.Children.count(children) - 1;
+       const roundedStyle = isFirst 
+         ? 'rounded-r-none border-r-0' 
+         : isLast 
+           ? 'rounded-l-none' 
+           : 'rounded-none border-r-0';
+       
+       return React.cloneElement(child, {
+         variant: child.props.variant || variant,
+         size: child.props.size || size,
+         className: cn(roundedStyle, child.props.className),
+       });
+     });
+     
+     return (
+       <div 
+         className={cn('inline-flex', className)} 
+         ref={ref} 
+         {...props}
+       >
+         {clonedChildren}
+       </div>
+     );
+   }
+ );
+ ButtonGroup.displayName = 'ButtonGroup';
+ 
+ export { Button, IconButton, ButtonGroup, buttonVariants };
```

```diff
+ 
+ // Simple tooltip implementation
+ const Tooltip = ({
+   children,
+   content,
+   variant,
+   size,
+   shadow,
+   rounded,
+   position = 'top',
+   delay = 300,
+   className,
+   ...props
+ }) => {
+   const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = React.useState(false);
+   const [coords, setCoords] = React.useState({ x: 0, y: 0 });
+   const timeoutRef = React.useRef(null);
+   const triggerRef = React.useRef(null);
+   const tooltipRef = React.useRef(null);
+   
+   // Calculate position based on trigger element
+   const calculatePosition = () => {
+     if (!triggerRef.current || !tooltipRef.current) return;
+     
+     const triggerRect = triggerRef.current.getBoundingClientRect();
+     const tooltipRect = tooltipRef.current.getBoundingClientRect();
+     
+     let x = 0;
+     let y = 0;
+     
+     switch (position) {
+       case 'top':
+         x = triggerRect.left + (triggerRect.width / 2) - (tooltipRect.width / 2);
+         y = triggerRect.top - tooltipRect.height - 8;
+         break;
+       case 'bottom':
+         x = triggerRect.left + (triggerRect.width / 2) - (tooltipRect.width / 2);
+         y = triggerRect.bottom + 8;
+         break;
+       case 'left':
+         x = triggerRect.left - tooltipRect.width - 8;
+         y = triggerRect.top + (triggerRect.height / 2) - (tooltipRect.height / 2);
+         break;
+       case 'right':
+         x = triggerRect.right + 8;
+         y = triggerRect.top + (triggerRect.height / 2) - (tooltipRect.height / 2);
+         break;
+       default:
+         x = triggerRect.left + (triggerRect.width / 2) - (tooltipRect.width / 2);
+         y = triggerRect.top - tooltipRect.height - 8;
+     }
+     
+     // Adjust for viewport boundaries
+     const padding = 10;
+     x = Math.max(padding, Math.min(x, window.innerWidth - tooltipRect.width - padding));
+     y = Math.max(padding, Math.min(y, window.innerHeight - tooltipRect.height - padding));
+     
+     setCoords({ x, y });
+   };
+   
+   const handleMouseEnter = () => {
+     if (timeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(timeoutRef.current);
+     timeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => {
+       setIsVisible(true);
+       // Need to wait for the tooltip to be rendered before calculating position
+       setTimeout(calculatePosition, 0);
+     }, delay);
+   };
+   
+   const handleMouseLeave = () => {
+     if (timeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(timeoutRef.current);
+     timeoutRef.current = setTimeout(() => {
+       setIsVisible(false);
+     }, 100);
+   };
+   
+   // Add window resize listener
+   React.useEffect(() => {
+     const handleResize = () => {
+       if (isVisible) calculatePosition();
+     };
+     
+     window.addEventListener('resize', handleResize);
+     window.addEventListener('scroll', handleResize, true);
+     
+     return () => {
+       window.removeEventListener('resize', handleResize);
+       window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleResize, true);
+     };
+   }, [isVisible]);
+   
+   // Clean up timeout on unmount
+   React.useEffect(() => {
+     return () => {
+       if (timeoutRef.current) clearTimeout(timeoutRef.current);
+     };
+   }, []);
+   
+   // Add arrow based on position
+   const getArrowStyle = () => {
+     switch (position) {
+       case 'top':
+         return 'after:top-full after:left-1/2 after:-translate-x-1/2 after:border-t-current after:border-x-transparent after:border-b-transparent';
+       case 'bottom':
+         return 'after:bottom-full after:left-1/2 after:-translate-x-1/2 after:border-b-current after:border-x-transparent after:border-t-transparent';
+       case 'left':
+         return 'after:left-full after:top-1/2 after:-translate-y-1/2 after:border-l-current after:border-y-transparent after:border-r-transparent';
+       case 'right':
+         return 'after:right-full after:top-1/2 after:-translate-y-1/2 after:border-r-current after:border-y-transparent after:border-l-transparent';
+       default:
+         return 'after:top-full after:left-1/2 after:-translate-x-1/2 after:border-t-current after:border-x-transparent after:border-b-transparent';
+     }
+   };
+   
+   return (
+     <>
+       {React.cloneElement(children, {
+         ref: triggerRef,
+         onMouseEnter: handleMouseEnter,
+         onMouseLeave: handleMouseLeave,
+         onFocus: handleMouseEnter,
+         onBlur: handleMouseLeave,
+         ...props,
+       })}
+       
+       {isVisible && (
+         <div
+           ref={tooltipRef}
            className={cn(
-         'z-50 overflow-hidden rounded-md border bg-popover px-3 py-1.5 text-sm text-popover-foreground shadow-md animate-in fade-in-0 zoom-in-95 data-[state=closed]:animate-out data-[state=closed]:fade-out-0 data-[state=closed]:zoom-out-95 data-[side=bottom]:slide-in-from-top-2 data-[side=left]:slide-in-from-right-2 data-[side=right]:slide-in-from-left-2 data-[side=top]:slide-in-from-bottom-2',
```

8. Let's create a new theme-switcher component:

---

```diff
- 
+ import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react';
+ import { Sun, Moon, Laptop } from 'lucide-react';
+ import { Button } from './button';
+ import { cn } from '../../lib/utils';
+ 
+ const ThemeOptions = {
+   LIGHT: 'light',
+   DARK: 'dark',
+   SYSTEM: 'system',
+ };
+ 
+ const ThemeSwitcher = ({ className, iconOnly = false, variant = 'outline', size = 'sm' }) => {
+   const [theme, setTheme] = useState(() => {
+     // Get theme from localStorage or default to system
+     return localStorage.getItem('theme') || ThemeOptions.SYSTEM;
+   });
+ 
+   // Update theme when component mounts and when theme changes
+   useEffect(() => {
+     const updateTheme = () => {
+       const root = window.document.documentElement;
+       
+       // Remove both classes first
+       root.classList.remove('light', 'dark');
+       
+       // Apply theme based on selection or system preference
+       if (theme === ThemeOptions.SYSTEM) {
+         const systemTheme = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches
+           ? ThemeOptions.DARK
+           : ThemeOptions.LIGHT;
+         root.classList.add(systemTheme);
+       } else {
+         root.classList.add(theme);
+       }
+       
+       // Save to localStorage
+       localStorage.setItem('theme', theme);
+     };
+     
+     updateTheme();
+     
+     // Listen for system theme changes if using system theme
+     if (theme === ThemeOptions.SYSTEM) {
+       const mediaQuery = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)');
+       const handleChange = () => updateTheme();
+       mediaQuery.addEventListener('change', handleChange);
+       return () => mediaQuery.removeEventListener('change', handleChange);
+     }
+   }, [theme]);
+ 
+   // Cycle through themes: light -> dark -> system -> light
+   const cycleTheme = () => {
+     const themes = [ThemeOptions.LIGHT, ThemeOptions.DARK, ThemeOptions.SYSTEM];
+     const currentIndex = themes.indexOf(theme);
+     const nextIndex = (currentIndex + 1) % themes.length;
+     setTheme(themes[nextIndex]);
+   };
+ 
+   // Get current theme icon and label
+   const getThemeIcon = () => {
+     switch (theme) {
+       case ThemeOptions.LIGHT:
+         return <Sun className="h-[1.2rem] w-[1.2rem]" />;
+       case ThemeOptions.DARK:
+         return <Moon className="h-[1.2rem] w-[1.2rem]" />;
+       case ThemeOptions.SYSTEM:
+         return <Laptop className="h-[1.2rem] w-[1.2rem]" />;
+       default:
+         return <Sun className="h-[1.2rem] w-[1.2rem]" />;
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   const getThemeLabel = () => {
+     switch (theme) {
+       case ThemeOptions.LIGHT:
+         return 'Light';
+       case ThemeOptions.DARK:
+         return 'Dark';
+       case ThemeOptions.SYSTEM:
+         return 'System';
+       default:
+         return 'Light';
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     <Button
+       variant={variant}
+       size={size}
+       onClick={cycleTheme}
+       className={cn(
+         'transition-all duration-200',
+         className
+       )}
+       title={`Theme: ${getThemeLabel()}`}
+       aria-label={`Switch theme, current theme is ${getThemeLabel()}`}
+     >
+       {getThemeIcon()}
+       {!iconOnly && (
+         <span className="ml-2">{getThemeLabel()}</span>
+       )}
+     </Button>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ // Dropdown theme switcher with options
+ const ThemeSwitcherDropdown = ({ className }) => {
+   const [theme, setTheme] = useState(() => {
+     return localStorage.getItem('theme') || ThemeOptions.SYSTEM;
+   });
+   const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false);
+   const dropdownRef = React.useRef(null);
+ 
+   // Handle theme updates
+   useEffect(() => {
+     const updateTheme = () => {
+       const root = window.document.documentElement;
+       root.classList.remove('light', 'dark');
+       
+       if (theme === ThemeOptions.SYSTEM) {
+         const systemTheme = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches
+           ? ThemeOptions.DARK
+           : ThemeOptions.LIGHT;
+         root.classList.add(systemTheme);
+       } else {
+         root.classList.add(theme);
+       }
+       
+       localStorage.setItem('theme', theme);
+     };
+     
+     updateTheme();
+     
+     if (theme === ThemeOptions.SYSTEM) {
+       const mediaQuery = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)');
+       const handleChange = () => updateTheme();
+       mediaQuery.addEventListener('change', handleChange);
+       return () => mediaQuery.removeEventListener('change', handleChange);
+     }
+   }, [theme]);
+ 
+   // Close dropdown when clicking outside
+   useEffect(() => {
+     const handleClickOutside = (event) => {
+       if (dropdownRef.current && !dropdownRef.current.contains(event.target)) {
+         setIsOpen(false);
+       }
+     };
+     
+     document.addEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside);
+     return () => document.removeEventListener('mousedown', handleClickOutside);
+   }, []);
+ 
+   // Get current theme icon
+   const getThemeIcon = () => {
+     switch (theme) {
+       case ThemeOptions.LIGHT:
+         return <Sun className="h-[1.2rem] w-[1.2rem]" />;
+       case ThemeOptions.DARK:
+         return <Moon className="h-[1.2rem] w-[1.2rem]" />;
+       case ThemeOptions.SYSTEM:
+         return <Laptop className="h-[1.2rem] w-[1.2rem]" />;
+       default:
+         return <Sun className="h-[1.2rem] w-[1.2rem]" />;
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   return (
+     <div className={cn('relative', className)} ref={dropdownRef}>
+       <Button
+         variant="ghost"
+         size="sm"
+         onClick={() => setIsOpen(!isOpen)}
+         className="flex items-center gap-2"
+         aria-expanded={isOpen}
+         aria-haspopup="true"
+       >
+         {getThemeIcon()}
+         <span className="sr-only md:not-sr-only md:inline-block">
+           Theme
+         </span>
+       </Button>
+       
+       {isOpen && (
+         <div className="absolute right-0 mt-2 w-36 rounded-md bg-card border border-border shadow-md z-50 animate-in fade-in-0 zoom-in-95">
+           <div className="p-1">
+             <button
+               onClick={() => { setTheme(ThemeOptions.LIGHT); setIsOpen(false); }}
+               className={cn(
+                 'w-full flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm rounded-md',
+                 theme === ThemeOptions.LIGHT ? 'bg-accent text-accent-foreground' : 'hover:bg-accent/50'
+               )}
+             >
+               <Sun className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" />
+               Light
+             </button>
+             <button
+               onClick={() => { setTheme(ThemeOptions.DARK); setIsOpen(false); }}
+               className={cn(
+                 'w-full flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm rounded-md',
+                 theme === ThemeOptions.DARK ? 'bg-accent text-accent-foreground' : 'hover:bg-accent/50'
+               )}
+             >
+               <Moon className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" />
+               Dark
+             </button>
+             <button
+               onClick={() => { setTheme(ThemeOptions.SYSTEM); setIsOpen(false); }}
+               className={cn(
+                 'w-full flex items-center px-3 py-2 text-sm rounded-md',
+                 theme === ThemeOptions.SYSTEM ? 'bg-accent text-accent-foreground' : 'hover:bg-accent/50'
+               )}
+             >
+               <Laptop className="h-4 w-4 mr-2" />
+               System
+             </button>
+           </div>
+         </div>
+       )}
+     </div>
+   );
+ };
+ 
+ export { ThemeSwitcher, ThemeSwitcherDropdown, ThemeOptions }; 
```
